resources.string: Established in 1993, EVENT LOCATIONS (previously called Locations) is the #1 source for finding a venue for Weddings, Social Occasions and Corporate Events in the NY / NJ metro area. In Feb. 2011 we developed an Android Tablets which you can download for free form androidmarket.com.
Win an 8 day/7 night ALL INCLUSIVE honeymoon to Jamaica. Hotel, Food & liquor included.
Value is $3,000 - $4,000 depending on date. Airfare & transfers not included. No purchase required. Please click the button below to View Rules & Regulations

The "Win a Honeymoon" prize is accommodations for 8 days and 7 nights at Breezes Negril Resort. For two people in one room. Includes meals, beverages, premium liquor, hotel and hotel taxes. Accommodations are based on availability and maybe subject to restrictions, blackout dates and limitations. Approximate retail value of the prize is $3,000 - $4,000 depending upon date chosen. Honeymoon package is subject to availability.
Google is not sponsor or involved in this "Win a Honeymoon" sweepstakes in any manner
Airfare and hotel transfers are not included. Optional services such as massage and off-resort excursions are not included.
To enter, visit our website at
or send your name, address, phone and wedding date on a 3” x 5” card to:? Event Locations,
or send your name, address, phone and wedding date
on a 3” x 5” card to:? Event Locations,

All entries must be received by December 31st. Event Locations and Event Locations are not responsible for late or lost entries. The decision of the judges is final. Duplicate, mutilated, illegible or incomplete entries will be disqualified. One entry per person.

Eligibility; This drawing is open to legal residents of the US, 18 years or older. Employees of Breezes and their immediate families are not eligible to win. Immediate families include spouse, parents and children.
The winner will be selected in a drawing held on January 15th. Odds of winning are dependent upon the number of complete entries received.
The winner will be notified. The prize must be claimed within four weeks of notification. If the prize isn’t claimed, it will be awarded in a second drawing among the entries received.
The prize is not redeemable for any monetary value, nor transferable to any other person.
All Federal, State and City taxes are the responsibility of the winner. The winner must sign an affidavit of eligibility and compliance with the rules.
By accepting the prize, winners also consent to the use of their names, photographs, biographical information, or likeness in future promotions and publicity without compensation.
All federal, state and local laws and regulations apply. Void where prohibited.
Prize substitution is prohibited. Winners may upgrade at their own expense.

Incidentals, purchases, departure taxes and other personal expenses are the sole responsibility of the winner. The trip must be taken within one year or a date mutually agreed upon by Breezes whichever is longer.
Prizes are not redeemable for cash. Prizes may not be extended, transferred or substituted.

Conditions; As a condition of receiving the grand prize, grand prize winner (GPW) will be required to appear and present valid photo ID proving age and US residency and maybe required to sign other legal documents including tax forms.

All winners, by accepting prizes, release Breezes, Event Locations and Event Locations from any and all liability with respect to any prize or any actions whatever for injuries, damage or loss to persons or property which may be sustained in connection with the sweepstakes or receipt or use of prizes.
By entering, participants agree to be bound by these official rules. All federal, state and local taxes apply. Event Locations decision is final.
